topic.title: Cancer Treatment List Entry - conformance rules

section.p: The act or process of identifying a single course of treatment regimen, for the patient's cancer.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] precedence with data type Integer
Provides an indication of whether the cancer treatment is primary, secondary, tertiary, etc.
Contains exactly one [1..1] cancerTreatment, where its type is Cancer Treatment

Contains exactly one [1..1] precedence with data type Integer
Provides an indication of whether the cancer treatment is primary, secondary, tertiary, etc.
Contains exactly one [1..1] cancerTreatment, where its type is Cancer Treatment
